title: Nicole Psomas On The Evolution Of Medical Procedures & Recoveries
itunes:title: Nicole Psomas On The Evolution Of Medical Procedures & Recoveries
description:
#454: Nicole Psomas is a physical therapist and author who graduated with a Master's of Health and Science in Physical Therapy from Thomas Jefferson University in 2003. Today Nicole joins the show to discuss her book "After The Cut" - How to prepare for and recover from cosmetic plastic surgery. 

To connect with Lauryn Evarts click HERE

To connect with Michael Bosstick click HERE

Read More on The Skinny Confidential HERE

For Detailed Show Notes visit TSCPODCAST.COM

To Call the Him & Her Hotline call: 1-833-SKINNYS (754-6697)

Produced by Dear Media
